channel.title: Toshiaki Toyada on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Toshiaki Toyada on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Transcending Dimensions’ Review: Inner Space Meets Outer Space in a Cosmicomic Phantasmagoria
item.description: The path to enlightenment is a booby-trap-laden maze in “Transcending Dimensions,” which Japanese cult director Toshiaki Toyoda says may be his last feature. It can certainly be taken as a sort of sum
